document.full_text: thai and cambodian troops clashed with guns and artillery on monday after almost a full-day break in fighting that has killed at least 12 people in four days and sent nearly 50,000 into evacuation centers.
document.title: thai and cambodia troops clash again
lines_and_colors: thai and cambodian troops clashed with guns and artillery on monday after almost a full-day break in fighting that has killed at least 12 people in four days and sent nearly 50,000 into evacuation centers.
